package study;

public class p8 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int n = 5;
		for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) {//space
			for (int j=1;j<=n-i;j++) {
				System.out.print(" ");
			}
			for (int j=1;j<=5;j++) {//star
				System.out.print("*");
			}
			System.out.println();
		}

	}

}
